data.title: Charlotte Savoy & The Savoy Team At Keller Williams Integrity - ELLICOTT CITY, MD Real Estate Agent
data.meta_description: Find real estate agent & Realtor® Charlotte Savoy & The Savoy Team At Keller Williams Integrity in ELLICOTT CITY, MD on realtor.com®, your source for top rated real estate professionals.
data.text:
Hi! I'm Charlotte Savoy, and I am a native of Maryland. I began my real estate career in 1999 and am proud to have established myself as a respected leader & innovator in the industry.

Our mission at The Savoy Team at Keller Williams Integrity is to be your trusted advisor for “all things real estate” while building a relationship-driven business that thrives on referrals provided by everyone we serve.

Since 2004, my team has been in the Top 10 Teams at ALL Real Estate brokerages in Maryland and in the Top 1% of all Real Estate Agents worldwide, too!

I’ve personally been involved in more than 5500 Real Estate transactions, and I teach and coach other Realtors nationwide. We have a reputation in the community for integrity and commitment to excellence, and if you read our reviews, you’ll see just that!

What that means for you is a painless, hassle-free experience and an experience that's second to none! I am personally involved in every single Real Estate transaction with our team, which is a rare find with a top producing Agent and team!

My vast knowledge of the real estate industry, commitment to being learning-based, and deep commitment to helping my clients achieve their goals through real estate...make my partners and me at The Savoy Team the Real Estate team that you want to work with!

Every agent on our team is experienced, and we are a systems-based team that excels at communication and ensuring that our clients achieve their goals, whether getting top dollar when you sell your home or helping you win the competition for your dream home when you buy!

We also launched a charity in 2016 to feed children in our local community called "Just ONE Kid," and every time we sell a house, we feed a child for an entire year at two local elementary schools. Currently, we are feeding 226 kids every single week! So when you choose to work with us, you're also choosing to help our local community! We’ve provided more than 260,000 meals since we started this great work!

Please reach out to us; we'd love to help you make your move!
